name: Song of Asirra - Demo 1
description:
This is the first playable demo of Song of Asirra! You'll get to explore the peaceful Lillipet Village, meet a cast of NPCs as they go about their lives, learn a magic spell, and more! 

This demo was released as a Patreon-exclusive benefit on September 13th, 2018. Patrons in the $3 tier and up can link their accounts to claim this demo for free! For more information on the benefits of being a Song of Asirra patron check out the Patreon homepage.
